predicate.note: Frames file for 'function' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'work'

example.name: with job
example.text: Arbitrage-1 simply transfers his selling pressure from Chicago to New York, while *trace*-1 functioning as a buyer in Chicago.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Asset Privatization Trust, the agency chiefly responsible for selling government-held properties, has recorded sales of more than $500 million since it-1 began *trace*-1 functioning in December 1986.
